title: 发一下作业
txt_content:
本帖最后由 01186 于 2014-2-1 11:27 编辑 

这是我的作业大家看看怎么样


这个是要求:
We'll be writing a poem today, a lyric poem. Here are your requirements:
Topic: something you are learning about in one of your classesMust be a lyric poem; cannot tell a story.Must have a creative title. Don't call it "Math".Must include at least one figure of speech (simile, metaphor, personification, or hyperbole) and HIGHLIGHT it in YELLOW.Must include at least one example of a sound device (assonance, alliteration, onomatopoeia, repetition) and HIGHLIGHT it in another color.Does NOT need to have end rhyme or meter, but if you use it, you must use it consistently.Must be at least 10 lines long and not longer than 30 lines.

Your first draft will be due on Friday.



这个是我写的:

Math Book for Sale! 
Algebra is difficult to understand.Sometimes a letter is a number,But not all numbers are letters 
Graphing a function is confusing.Sometimes it's hard to find a point,And what is a y-interceptanyways? 
Word problems I cannot understand.Words mean so many different things;They belong in a song or sad story. 
Homework... every day and weekends?Not just one or two or three problems,But one, two, or three pages at least! 
Mybrain is not like a computer.I need time to relax and play my games.


大家看看写的怎么样?

随便说一下,我准备要发图包了(正在上传)
[groupid=500]绅士交流团~~[/groupid]

replies.author: 13579koo
replies.txt_content:
1.Topic ：一些你在你的类中的一个学习
2.Must是一首抒情诗，能不能讲一个故事。
3.Must有创意的标题。不要把它叫做“数学” 。
4.Must包括语音的至少一个数字（明喻，比喻，拟人，夸张或），并用黄色高亮显示。
5.Must包括声音设备（谐音，押韵，拟声词，重复）的至少一个例子，并突出它的另一种颜色。
6.Does不需要有底韵或水表，但如果你使用它，你必须坚持使用它。
7.Must是至少10线长和不超过30行更长的时间。


你的第一稿将于周五公布。












数学书出售！


代数是很难理解的。
有时，一个字母是一个数字，
但是，并非所有的数字都是字母


函数作图是混乱的。
有时很难找到一个点，
什么是“Y” interceptanyways ？


我无法理解单词的问题。
话的意思是这么多不同的事情;
它们属于一首歌或悲伤的故事。


功课...每天和周末？
不只是一个或两个或三个问题
但一个，两个，或三个页面至少！










Shùxué shū chūshòu!


Dàishù shì hěn nán lǐjiě de.
Yǒushí, yīgè zìmǔ shì yīgè shùzì,
Dànshì, bìngfēi suǒyǒu de shùzì dōu shì zìmǔ


Hánshù zuò tú shì hǔnluàn de.
Yǒushí hěn nán zhǎodào yīgè diǎn,
Shénme shì “Y” interceptanyways?


Wǒ wúfǎ lǐjiě dāncí de wèntí.
Huà de yìsi shì zhème duō bùtóng de shìqíng;
Tāmen shǔyú yī shǒu gē huò bēishāng de gùshì.


Gōngkè... Měitiān hé zhōumò?
Bù zhǐshì yīgè huò liǎng gè huò sān gè wèntí
Dàn yīgè, liǎng gè, huò sān gè yèmiàn zhìshǎo!


Mybrain bù xiàng shì yī tái diànnǎo.
Wǒ xūyào shíjiān lái fàngsōng hé wán yóuxì yóuxì  Please help Google Translate improve quality for your language here.
